blue-day_one-default.text: Ah, here he is â€“ the man of the hour. I do hope your brilliant solution is worth the wait

blue-day_one-default.text: I myself have a few ideas, should yours prove to be insufficient

meeting_day_one-yes.text: (You have decided to sacrifice innocent lives to try to stop the moon)
